item.title: Funke Akindele, Omoni Oboli, Mercy Johnson Gush Over AY's Daughter's Photo As They Storm Church For
item.description: Nigerian comedian cum filmmaker Ayo Makun popularly called AY has shared a beautiful photo of his second daughter Ayomide as they storm the church for their thanksgiving. Recall AY and his wife Mabel Makun welcomed a baby girl earlier this year after 13 years of having their first daughter and the feeling has been overwhelming. A video shared on his Instagram page captured AY, his wife and his first daughter in church as they dance in excitement.

item.title: Flying Eagles Of Nigeria Return To Winning Ways At 2024 All-African Games
item.description: The Flying Eagles of Nigeria have finally recorded their first win in the ongoing 2024 All-African Games after an abysmal start to the tournament. The Flying Eagles of Nigeria, who finished second in the last edition of the All African Games in Morocco, were expected to stroll past Group B of the ongoing edition. Unfortunately, they suffered an unexpected 2-1 defeat at the hands of a lowly-rated Ugandan side in their opening group stage.

item.title: Marcelito Pomoy - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Tenor and soprano who rocketed to fame after winning the second season of Pilipinas Got Talent. He went on to release the debut album Duet Yourself in 2011. Before Fame Throughout his teen years, he did a number of odd jobs. He even tried out for Talentadong Pinoy, though he didn't make it. Trivia Following his Pilipinas Got Talent win, he became an on and off host on the show ASAP in 2011.

item.title: Pep Guardiola Blasts Chelsea's Transfer Spending
item.description: The manager of Manchester City, Pep Guardiola has blasted the transfer spending of Chelsea, saying if it was City that was spending as much as Chelsea have been doing lately, it would have attracted more scrutiny to the club. Since Todd Boehly and his consortium took over Chelsea ahead of last summer, the Stamford Bridge side have spent around £850 million on new players including the £53 million they shelled out for Romeo Lavia.

item.title: Picha 5 za bintiye hayati Lucky Dube ambaye pia ni mwimbaji mahiri wa Reggae
item.description: Marehemu Lucky Dube ni kati ya wanamziki wa Reggae waliobobea zaidi katika fani ya utumbuizaji na nyimbo zake zilisheheni jumbe nzito dhidi ya udhalimu wa mfumo wa Apartheid. Kando na muziki, Dube wakiwa na mkewe Zanele Mdluli walijaliwa na watoto saba. Habari Nyingine: Huyu ndiye mwanamke anayelipwa mshahara mkubwa zaidi ulimwenguni? Waswahili husema: Mwana wa mhunzi asiposana huvuvia. Hivyo ndivyo ilivyo kwa Dube ambaye bintiye Nkulee Dube anazidi kubobea katika uga wa muziki wa Reggae.

item.title: Shaun O'Neale - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: DJ turned chef who won season seven of the reality cooking competition series MasterChef. He previously worked as a DJ and has collaborated with global brands such as Playboy, Dreamworks, Sony and Playstation. He founded his own record label Extatic Music. Before Fame He first entered the music scene in 2002 as a house music DJ and became a turntablist and known name by 2006. Trivia He became the first DJ to perform on Las Vegas Boulevard for one of the biggest New Years Eve parties in 2011.

item.title: Bryana Salaz - Age, Family, Bio
Harry Belafonte - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Singer and activist known as the King of Calypso. He popularized the calypso genre and famously sang "The Banana Boat Song." Before Fame He joined the Navy during World War II. After he was discharged, he worked as a janitor in New York City. His boss gave him tickets to the American Negro Theatre, which got him interested in performance. Trivia He appeared in the film White Man's Burden with John Travolta.

item.title: Is Eric Braeden Leaving 'The Young and Restless'? What to Know
item.description: After "nasty" negotiations with Sony, and a weeks-long hiatus, do we know if Eric Braeden will be leaving 'The Young and Restless'? Fans of The Young and Restless probably know that Eric Braeden almost left the show. In fact, there was a lot of drama over his role of Victor Newman — at one point he took a 5-week leave from The Young and Restless, making viewers wonder if he'll ever return (he did).

item.title: Snoop Dogg's Custom Olympic Pin Is as Cool As You'd Expect
item.description: Snoop Dogg's 2024 Olympics Run Is Unmatched, and Now, He Has a Commemorative PinSnoop's pin isn't for sale yet, but it could be available soon. By Joseph AllenPublished July 31 2024, 9:44 a.m. ET Source: Instagram/@cocogauffThe 2024 Olympics in Paris have been chock full of surprising outcomes in competition, but one of the biggest surprises of the competition to date has been Snoop Dogg's prominent role in NBC's coverage of the games.

item.title: Female Characters Are Often Dragged in Books and Women Have Had Enough
item.description: Women Are Sick Of How Often Female Characters Are Criticized In Popular BooksBy Aimee LutkinUpdated Nov. 18 2019, 2:17 p.m. ET Source: Warner Bros.For a long time, the world of fantasy, sci-fi and young adult books was largely populated by young boy protagonists. That's shifted, thankfully, though there is still a dearth of diversity. But the shift in the gender gap has highlighted how bias in the real world has crossed over to how people experience made-up ones.

item.title: Jaclyn Hill Claps Back at Trolls Who Say She Got Too Much Plastic Surgery
item.description: Jaclyn Hill before plastic surgery: the makeup guru clapped back at fans who trolled her appearance by saying that she looks different from weight gain. Source: GettyIf you fancy yourself a beauty expert, then you've likely heard of Jaclyn Hill for her epic makeup tutorials and bestselling Morphe collabs. If you consider yourself up-to-date on celebrity gossip, then you've likely heard of Jaclyn Hill because of her failed makeup line, where customers accused her of selling lipsticks with hairs on them.

item.title: Joe Sugg - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Eccentric YouTube vlogger who is known for his channel ThatcherJoe, which has earned over 7 million subscribers. He is best known for his unique impressions of such celebrities as One Direction's Niall Horan and fellow YouTuber Tyler Oakley. In 2018, he became runner-up on the 16th season of Strictly Come Dancing. Before Fame He joined the vlogging world in August of 2012. Trivia He also has a secondary channel called ThatcherJoeVlogs, and a gaming channel, ThatcherJoeGames, both of which have gained a following as well.

item.title: Justin Trudeau - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Canadian politician who became Prime Minister of Canada in 2015. He previously served as a member of parliament from Papineau, becoming the leader of the country's Liberal Party in 2013. Before Fame Following his father into politics, he got involved in the Liberal party from an early age, speaking out on everything from federalism to Quebec's secession. Trivia He used his political power to promote public safety, specifically avalanche warning programs, and opposed the construction of zinc mines, which he argued would poison the local environment.

item.title: Nigerians Express Concern For Portable's Newborn Baby As He Heaps 'Dirty' Naira Notes On Him
item.description: Some Nigerians have expressed concern for the newborn baby of popular singer Habeeb Okikiola better known as Portable. Naija News earlier reported that Portable took to his Instagram page to announce the birth of his second child with his baby mama. Since then, many Nigerian celebrities and fans have stormed his page with congratulatory messages. Some of the photos shared on his Instagram page captured how Portable heaped dirty Naira notes on the newborn baby.

item.title: "Gangsta's Paradise" Rapper Coolio Died at Age 59 What Was His Cause of Death?
item.description: What was Coolio's cause of death? Here's everything we know about the death of the 59-year-old "Gangsta's Paradise" rapper and how he died. Source: Getty ImagesSeptember 2022 was a sad, sad month for hip-hop. Early in the month, outlets confirmed that 36-year-old Canadian recording artist Pat Stay had been stabbed to death. Weeks later, “Selfish” rapper PnB Rock was shot and killed while dining with his girlfriend and daughter at a Los Angeles eatery.

item.title: Does Willy Baker Die in All American? His Fate Is in the Balance
item.description: In the final moments of the ‘All American’ mid-season finale, Willy Baker appears to die … or almost die. Does he really die, or will he be OK? Unfortunately, we now have to wait a few months until the next episode of All American. The midseason finale took place at the Beverly Hills prom, but a lot more besides a few dances and teen shenanigans went down. Now, it looks like Willy Baker is in danger, which would be a major blow to our favorite characters in All American.

item.title: Donald Trump Speaks On Attending Joe Biden's Inauguration
item.description: United States President Donald Trump has said he will not attend the inauguration of President-elect Joe Biden on January 20, 2021. “To all of those who have asked, I will not be going to the Inauguration on January 20th,” Trump wrote on Twitter on Friday. https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1347569870578266115 Trump on Thursday finally recognised Joe Biden as the President-Elect of the United States after encouraging his supporters to go to Capitol Hill during a heated speech where he claimed the US elections was stolen.

item.title: Jessica Tandy - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Driving Miss Daisy Oscar winner who was married to Hume Cronyn. In 1979, she was inducted into the American Theatre Hall of Fame. Before Fame She joined the Birmingham Repertory Theatre at the age of 16. Trivia She won a Tony Award for her role in A Streetcar Named Desire. Family Life She married Jack Hawkins in 1932. The couple had a daughter two years later, and divorced in 1940.

item.title: Ooni of Ife Officially Marries Fifth Wife, Ronke Ademiluyi (Photos)
item.description: The Ooni of Ife, Oba Adeyeye Enitan Ogunwusi, has finally tied the knot with his fifth wife, Princess Ronke Ademiluyi. Naija News reports that the event is currently being held at Ile-Ife Osun State, among friends and family members. Photos and videos from the traditional wedding ceremony which emerged online showed the new bride beaming with smiles. Like his previous wedding, Ooni was visibly absent while the royal guards, palace chiefs and royal staff were there to represent the Yoruba monarch.

item.title: Adrienne Bailon - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Pop singer who started with 3LW, then became a member of The Cheetah Girls, the Disney pop group known for their self-titled TV movie and hit single, as well as tracks like "Girl Power." She was joined in The Cheetah Girls by Sabrina Bryan and Kiely Williams. In 2013, she became a co-host on the TV series The Real.  Before Fame She was originally planning on a career in healthcare before her musical group took off.

item.title: Bandokay - Age, Family, Bio
Cat Stevens - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Folk singer-songwriter who wrote and performed songs like "The First Cut is the Deepest," "Where Do the Children Play?," and "Wild World." Before Fame He credited West Side Story with giving him a new perspective that shaped his music. His choice to go solo was made after he realized a band was not the right artistic dynamic he needed. Trivia In 1978, he gave up his music career and changed his name to Yusuf Islam, donating all of his guitars in order to dedicate his life to Islamic educational causes.

item.title: Corazon na mzungu wake wawaumiza wanaume jinsi walivyolishana mabusu motomoto (Picha)
item.description: - Corazon Kwamboka na mchumba wake wamewaacha wengi kuumia kwa wivu kwa picha zao wakilishana mabusu makali - Wawili hao walikuwa Roma, Italia kwa mapumziko yao wakati picha hiyo ilipopigwa na muda mfupi baadaye, picha zao katika Instagram wakilishana mabusu yao zilifutwa Sosholaiti Mkenya Cozaron Kwamboka na mchumba wake Mzungu Gaetano Amato wamekuwa wakigonga vichwa vya habari sana kwa namna wanavyolishana mahaba. Wawili hao waliwafanya wengi wa wafuasi wao kuingiwa na wivu wakati walipochapisha picha zao wakilishana mapenzi motomoto.

item.title: Whitemoney Receives 30m Cash Prize, Others (Photos)
item.description: The organizers of Big Brother Naija on Monday presented 30 million Naira to the winner of the ‘Shine Ya Eye’ edition, Whitemoney. The prizes were presented to Whitemoney live on the BBNaija channel on DSTV on Monday. The reality tv star was also presented with a house key and a car by the organizers of the highly watched show. Among the prizes, Whitemoney got on Monday was a ₦30m cash prize, cash in an Abeg digital wallet and bitcoins courtesy of Patricia, a two-bedroom apartment courtesy of RevolutionPlus Property, a top of range SUV from Innoson Motors, and a sponsored trip for two.

item.title: Man Hid Millions in Inheritance from His Fiance for 4 Years While She Paid All Their Expenses
item.description: Man Hid Extreme Wealth From Fiancée for 4 Years While She Struggled to Pay All Their ExpensesBy Robin ZlotnickAug. 24 2020, Updated 11:39 a.m. ET Source: iStockIt's understandable that a person might not reveal their extreme wealth to the person they are dating for some time. You want to make sure the person really likes you because of who you are, not the money you have. That being said, when it's four years in and you're engaged is a little late.

item.title: Martyn Ware - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Known for founding and fronting the New Wave bands Heaven 17 and The Human League, this vocalist and keyboard player also had a career as a music producer. His production credits include a 1994 Erasure album and several Vince Clarke projects. Before Fame He studied at the Edward VII School in Sheffield, England. Trivia He designed a three-dimensional, surround-sound exhibit for Sheffield, England's National Centre for Popular Music museum. Family Life He settled in the Primrose Hill district of London with his wife Landsley and his son Gabriel and daughter Elena.

item.title: Mike Tyson, boxing legend, sold 50-room mansion to 50 Cent for 3.3m
item.description: - Mike Tyson sold his mansion in 2003 to rapper 50 Cent - The boxing legend was declared bankrupt and had to sell - Tyson's mansion has 50 rooms and was sold at £3.3m Mike Tyson was known for his brutal and merciless punches against opponents during his active boxing days which made him as one of the greatest boxers ever. The American made so much money during his career in boxing and was the youngest boxer to win an heavyweight title when he was just 20 years.

item.title: Why did 'Gone With the Wind' Get Banned? HBO Max Has Pulled It
item.description: 'Gone With the Wind' Was Pulled From HBO Max Because of Racist Slave DepictionsBy Joseph AllenUpdated June 10 2020, 11:15 a.m. ET Source: TwitterAdjusted for inflation, Gone With the Wind is the highest-grossing movie in cinema history. It was a giant at that year's Academy Awards, and its epic story of love set against the backdrop of the American Civil War has helped it to endure for more than 80 years.

item.title: Charlotte Dujardin - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Olympic equestrian champion who won two gold medals for the team and individual dressage events at the 2012 London games. Before Fame She began riding at the age of 2, and began training in dressage with a horse bought with her grandmother's inheritance. Trivia Became widely considered as the best dressage riders in the world, winning all major titles and world records in the sport. Family Life She was born in the London Borough of Enfield with an older sister.

item.title: COVID-19: Hamna aliyepoteza maisha yake katika saa 24 zilizopita
item.description: - Watu 153 wameripotiwa kunasa virusi vya corona katika muda wa saa 24 zilizopita - Kati ya visa vipya vilivyorekodiwa Wakenya ni 123 na raia wa nchi za kigeni ni 30 - Jumla ya idadi ya wagonjwa waliopata nafuu ni 83,990 Watu 153 wameripotiwa kunasa virusi vya corona katika muda wa saa 24 zilizopita baada ya sampuli 3,922 kupimwa. Kufikia sasa jumla ya wagonjwa waliopata maradhi hayo hatari nchini Kenya imegonga 101,009.

item.title: Rais Uhuru arejea Kabarak baada ya mazishi ya Mzee Moi
item.description: - Rais Uhuru Alhamisi alirudi Kabarak kuituliza familia ya Moi baada ya mazishi ya Jumatano - Rais hakuandamana na wasaidizi au walinzi wengi wakati wa ziara hiyo ambapo alitaka kupata muda na familia - Mazishi ya Moi yalifichua kuwa familia ya Moi na Kenyatta zina urafiki mkubwa ulioanza tangu Mzee Jomo Kenyatta kufariki Rais Uhuru Kenyatta Alhamisi, Februari 13 aliingia ndege na kupepea mpaka nyumbani kwa Mzee Moi Kabarak Nakuru siku moja tu baada ya mazishi ya Mzee.

item.title: There Are Lots of Unofficial Ways to Have Multiple Roblox Games Open on Your Computer
item.description: Want to know how to have two Robloxs open at once on your computer? People have come up with different third-party apps to play on multiple accounts. Source: Roblox CorporationHow much Roblox is too much Roblox? The online gaming and game creation platform saw some increased popularity in the early days of the COVID-19 pandemic and still stands as a beloved gaming space that can be officially accessed on gaming PC gaming hardware, iOS, Android, and Xbox.

item.title: Kellita Smith - Age, Family, Bio
Massive Crowd As Ayu, Others Welcome Shekarau Back To PDP In Kano
item.description: The national chairman of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Iyorchia Ayu on Monday confirmed the return of former Kano State Governor, Senator Ibrahim Shekarau to the party. The ceremony to receive Shekarau back from the New Nigeria Peoples Party (NNPP) to the PDP was held in Kano State, Naija News reports. Shekarau defected along with thousands of his fans and supporters after a fallout with the NNPP leader and presidential candidate, Rabiu Kwankwaso.

item.title: Rema Makes Huge History In America
item.description: Afrobeat singer Rema, born Divine Ikubor, has become the artiste with the most streamed African song in the history of the United States. Naija News reports ‘Calm Down’ displaced CKay’s ‘Love Nwantiti’ which was hitherto the most streamed African song in US history. The statistic was made known on Friday by an American music data compilation website, via its Twitter page. It showed Rema’s Calm down as the most streamed Afrobeats song.

item.title: Shehu Sani Knocks Osinbajo, Lawan, For Attending Turbaning Of Yusuf Buhari
item.description: Former Kaduna Central Senator, Shehu Sani has condemned the outing on Saturday which saw many top government officials including Vice President Yemi Osinbajo, Senate President Ahmad Lawan, and many others storm Daura, Katsina State for the turbaning ceremony of Yusuf, President Muhammadu Buhari’s son. Sani who described the turbaning as ‘unemphatic’ knocked the government officials for overlooking threatening security issues in the area as well as the victims of recent attacks to hold the lavish turbaning ceremony.

item.description: A veteran Nigerian rapper, Eedris Abdulkareem, has expressed displeasure over what his senior colleague, Charles Oputa, popularly known as Charly Boy, did to him. Naija News reports that the ‘Jaga Jaga’ crooner, made this known in a snippet from an unreleased episode of ‘The Honest Bunch’, podcast which is set to be released on Monday, February 19. The musician, who won the battle against kidney disease in 2022, said his colleague, Charly Boy, is not a man of integrity as far as money is involved.

item.title: Victor Boniface Laments His Club's Title Loss In Belgium
item.description: Nigerian forward, Victor Boniface has taken to his Instagram page to lament his team’s inability to finish the season with the Belgium Jupiler Pro League title. Ahead of the last day of the season, Victor Boniface and his teammates at Union SG were in an advantaged position to win the league but they were expected to beat Club Brugge to seal the title. Unfortunately, Union SG who have been in fair form all season long lost to Club Brugge 3-1 at home to prevent themselves from winning the league title.

item.title: Asher Middleton - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Celebrity family member and social media figure who rose to fame for being the son of YouTube content creator DanTDM and Jemma Middleton. Before Fame He made his social media debut in a tweet from his mother on January 9, 2020. Trivia His parents announced on Instagram that they would be hiding his face from the public. Family Life He is the son of DanTDM and Jemma Middleton. Associated With Both his father and Jake Paul found fame on YouTube.

item.title: Is Donald Trump Required to Debate Kamala Harris?
item.description: Is Donald Trump Required to Debate Kamala Harris if She's Chosen as the Democratic Nominee?"Everybody knows who I am, and now people know who she is," Trump said. By Elissa NoblittPublished July 30 2024, 1:37 p.m. ET Source: Getty imagesIt's a longstanding tradition that candidates going head-to-head to win the U.S. presidency will, during the campaign trail, engage each other in a televised debate to discuss policies, qualifications, and in some cases, golf handicaps.

His roles have earned him several accolades, from a handful of Golden Globe awards, to his very own star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.

item.title: Juvenile - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Born Terius Gray, he is a southern rapper best known for the singles "Back That Thang Up" and "Slow Motion." He released his ninth studio album, Beast Mode, in 2010. Before Fame He released his first album, Being Myself, at age twenty. Trivia His albums 400 Degreez, The G-Gode, and Juve the Great all went platinum. Family Life Has a son, Anthony, and had a daughter, Jelani, who was killed in 2008.

item.title: NLC Rejects Buhari Govt Move To Slash Salaries
item.description: Nigeria Labour Congress (NLC) President, Ayuba Wabba, has rejected the plan by the federal government to slash their salaries. Speaking on Wednesday, the NLC president noted that the plan was tantamount to a “mass suicide”. He regretted that the government is contemplating to unilaterally cut the salaries of civil servants, describing the declaration by Finance Minister, Zainab Ahmed as extremely horrendous. “The question is which salary is the government planning to slash?

item.title: Sean Paul Talks TikTok Popularity and Drops Gems for Newer Artists (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Sean Paul exclusively spoke to ‘Distractify’ about his TikTok popularity and how other artists can have the same longevity as his music has. Source: Getty ImagesJamaica’s very own Sean Paul is one of the biggest reggae and dancehall artists to make waves in the mainstream music industry. Since the early 2000s, the Kingston native has kept crowds worldwide dancing to hits like “Get Busy” and “Temperature.” During the early aughts, he also collaborated with so many artists that Apple Music has an entire playlist devoted to his features.

item.title: Uhandisi wa ujenzi wa mabwawa utapunguza maafa nchini - William Ruto
item.description: - Naibu rais William Ruto amezungumza baada ya mkasa wa bwawa la Patel eneo la Solai kaunti ya Nakuru -Bwawa hilo lilipasuka Jumanne usiku na maji kusomba vijiji vilivyokuwa karibu huku zaidi ya watu 48 wakipoteza maisha yao - Ruto alifanya mkutano na waziri wa Maji na Ukulima ili kujadili njia mwafaka ya kuzuia mikasa ya aina hii kutendeka mbeleni Naibu rais William Ruto amewataka makandarasi wote kukubaliana kuhusu mbinu mwafaka na za kisasa za kujenga mabwawa ili kuzuia mikasa au majanga nchini.

item.title: When Will the Pfizer Vaccine Be Available? Details on Its Progress
item.description: It Will Still Be Awhile Before Any Sort of COVID-19 Vaccine Is ReadyBy Katie GarrityUpdated Nov. 9 2020, 9:56 p.m. ET Source: iStockIt’s safe to say that on top of everything happening in 2020, there is one major event that still has everyone wondering, “Can this please just be over?” The COVID-19 pandemic has made people around the world adjust and adapt to a “new normal” — one that has face masks, hand sanitizer at every door, and phrases like “social distancing” in our everyday vernacular.

item.title: How the Chilling Movie Ends (SPOILERS)
item.description: 'Blood Red Sky' Ending Explained: What happened to Elias and Nadja? (SPOILERS)By Leila KozmaJul. 27 2021, Published 12:04 p.m. ET Source: NetflixSpoiler alert: This article contains spoilers for Blood Red Sky. A horror-thriller about a mother who must reveal her darkest secret to save her son? That's Blood Red Sky in a nutshell. The Netflix movie captures the deadly aftermath of the hijacking of the Transatlantic 473, which quickly gives way to a supernatural disaster once the protagonist, Nadja (Peri Baumeister), transforms into a fully fledged vampire.

item.title: Jesse Wellens - Age, Family, Bio
Rebbie Jackson biography: Age, siblings, net worth, children
item.description: Rebbie Jackson is an American-born singer. She is the eldest child in the Jackson family of musicians. Rebbie dove into the world of music and conquered the industry just like her siblings. She has been a household name for many decades now. She has released several albums in her name and worked as a vocalist for many years. She has always managed to rise and do better even after facing many challenges in both her career and personal life.

item.title: 14 Bandits Killed As Officers Repel Attack On Benue Police Station
item.description: The Benue Police Command has confirmed the killing of 14 bandits during a gun battle with the assailants in Katsina-Ala town. Confirming the incident to newsmen on Sunday, State Police Public Relations Officer, DSP Kate Anene said some suspected bandits were arrested and detained at Katsina-Ala Divisional Police Station for investigations in the week. She said some gunmen around 1am, numbering about 50, in the early hours of Sunday launched an attack on the station in an attempt to free the suspects from custody.

Trivia His name comes from the East African for "Adventurous Traveler." Family Life He is the only child of Bob Marley and his table tennis champion wife Anita Belnavis. item.title: When Does 'Fire Country' Return? The Fall Finale Is Here
item.description: When does 'Fire Country' return after its fall break? The CBS drama is on hiatus during the 2022 holiday season and fans want to know when it comes back. It always feels a little dangerous to take a gamble on a new network drama during the premiere season, which is typically in September or October. But if you've watched the CBS drama Fire Country during its first season, you can see that the show is a hit among its millions of viewers.

item.title: Wike Vs Atiku: The Devil Is In Our Midst
item.description: A chieftain of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Olabode George has urged the party’s presidential flag bearer, Atiku Abubakar and Rivers State governor Nyesom Wike to shelve their differences. Naija News reports that the PDP has being in a state of crisis after the presidential primaries which produced Atiku as the party’s flag bearer. Wike had contested the presidential ticket but lost to the former vice-president. The rift in the party took a turn for the worse after Atiku picked Delta state governor Ifeanyi Okowa as his running mate.

item.title: Court Grants N50 Million Bail To Ex-Minister, Olu Agunloye
item.description: Embattled former Minister of Power and Steel, Olu Agunloye, has been granted bail in the sum of N50 million. Naija News reported earlier that Justice Jude Onwuegbuzie of the Federal Capital Territory (FCT) High Court Apo ordered Agunloye, who was charged with seven counts related to the fraudulent award of a contract and official corruption, to be remanded in Kuje Correctional Centre, until the bail application was heard and ruled upon.

item.title: Mutahi Ngunyi Awards KSh 50k to Netizen Who Made Video Demolishing Ruto's Hustler Nation Narrative
item.description: An upcoming comedian and entertainer known by the name Official Aluda made a video that sought to deconstruct Ruto's hustler narrativeThe viral video featured various clips including one which captured Ruto who is seen addressing a section of supporters The trending video caught Ngunyi's attention prompting him to award Aluda KSh 50,000 for demolishing the hustler narrativePolitical analyst Mutahi Ngunyi does not hide his strong dislike for Deputy President William Ruto and anything associated with the former Eldoret North KANU stalwart.

item.title: NDLEA Arrests General Overseer With Drugs
item.description: The General Overseer of Christ Living Hope Church, Rev Ugochukwu Emmanuel Ekwem has been arrested by the National Drug Law Enforcement Agency at the Murtala Muhammed International Airport for drug peddling. NDLEA arrested Ekwem while on his way to a three-week crusade in Nairobi, Kenya, with 54 sticks of drugs wrapped around his body. Ekwem was apprehended by operatives of NDLEA during outward clearance of passengers on Ethiopian Airlines flight to Nairobi via Addis Ababa.

item.title: Uzodinma Says Gulak's Killing Was Political, Denies Attack On His Convoy
item.description: Governor Hope Uzodinma of Imo State has claimed that the assassination of a former political aide to Goodluck Jonathan, Ahmed Gulak, as ‘Political’. Naija News had reported how Gulak was killed in the early hours of Sunday shortly after he left his hotel and was said to heading to the Sam Mbakwe airport to connect with a flight back to his destination. Reports also have it that the Imo state police command had confirmed the incident and insisted that late Gulak had failed to inform the police he was leaving for the airport before the sad incident occurred.

item.title: Jason Kidd - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: All-Star NBA point guard who played for the New Jersey Nets from 2001 to 2008 and helped lead the Dallas Mavericks to an NBA Championship in 2011. Before Fame He played pick-up basketball against Gary Payton while growing up in Oakland, California. Trivia He retired ranking 3rd in triple doubles in NBA history.

Osimhen is one of the 30-man nominees announced by CAF days after the 24-year-old striker finished 8th in the 2023 Ballon d’Or. Before now, no Nigerian footballer has ever finished in such a position since 1995 when the organizers, France Football, started recognizing footballers who are non-Europeans.

item.title: CBN Speaks On Banning Old N200, N500 And N1000 Notes
item.description: The Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) on Tuesday announced that it has extended the validity of the old N200, N500 and ₦1,000 notes indefinitely. The apex bank’s Director, Corporate Communications, Isa AbdulMumin disclosed this in a statement titled, “CBN To Allow Old Design Naira Banknotes As Legal Tender, Ad Infinitum” Abdulmumin said the decision is line with international best practices and to forestall a repeat of earlier experiences implementing the policy.

item.title: Jennifer Lawrence Once Did Competitive Cheerleading: Details

Over the years, the Joy actress has divulged stories from her time as a competitive cheerleader on various talk shows over the years, which might surprise fans who didn't realize she was athletic long before The Hunger Games.

item.title: Catholic Bishop reveals how Boko Haram killed 500 priests in Borno state
item.description: Most Rev. Oliver Doeme, the Bishop of the Catholic Diocese of Maiduguri, has revealed that no fewer than 500 Catholics were killed by Boko Haram members in Borno state, Daily Post reports. The cleric speaking in Maiduguri on Wednesday, April 5, lamented that 250 Catholic churches were set ablaze by the Boko Haram in 2014 alone in the North-East, while 25 reverend fathers and 40 reverend sisters have being rendered homeless.

item.title: Kogi Poll: INEC To Announce Official Results Today
item.description: Reports reaching Legit.ng indicate that the final results of the governorship polls in Kogi state will be announced today, November 22 by the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC).  [article_adwert] This comes hours after report had emanated that commission was getting ready to roll out official results of yesterday's governorship election across all local government areas. The commission had earlier taken to twitter on its official handle (@inecnigeria) to disregard results being posted on Social Media, describing them as “inaccurate”.

item.title: Ogun Monarch Withdraws Chieftaincy Title Given To Rochas Okorocha
item.description: The chieftaincy title conferred on the lawmaker representing Imo West senatorial district, Rochas Okorocha, has been withdrawn by the Eselu of Iselu Kingdom, Oba Akintunde Akinyemi. The monarch on Monday also canceled the installation ceremony which was earlier scheduled to hold on Sept. 19. The development was disclosed in a letter dated August 9, and released by the Monarch. The traditional ruler had recently conferred the position of Otunba Asoludero of Iselu kingdom in Yewa-North Local Government Area of Ogun on the former Governor of Imo State.

item.description: The Apple TV+ show 'Dickinson' is showing the world a queer Emily, but how accurate is it? Was Emily Dickinson Gay? Here's what we know. item.description: How did Epiphany from 'General Hospital' die? Fans knew that Epiphany's death was inevitable, but many want to know how she died in a recent episode. Source: ABCFollowing the heartbreaking news that Sonya Eddy died in December of 2022, fans knew that Epiphany, the character she played on General Hospital, couldn't be around forever. Now, we've reached the moment in the show where Epiphany dies, and many fans are wondering how the character leaves General Hospital, and why the show chose to kill the character off this way.

item.title: Fire Guts Kogi Assembly Building
item.description: The Kogi State House of Assembly complex located at Crusher Area, Lokoja, the state capital was gutted by fire in the early hours of Monday. Naija News learnt that the roof of the complex was ripped by fire leading to extensive damage to the floor of the house. The State Security Adviser, Jerry Omodara and the Speaker of the House of Assembly, Mathew Kolawole were among the early callers at the assembly complex.

item.title: Real Madrid Frees Hazard To Chelsea In Exchange For Reece James
item.description: Belgian professional footballer, Eden Hazard is reportedly on the verge of returning to English Premier League club, Chelsea. Reports obtained by Naija News on Monday have it that Real Madrid who the 30-year old winger and attacking midfielder currently plays for has agreed to let go of Hazard in exchange for Reece James, with another signing clause inclusive. According to El Nacional, the LaLiga giants hope to invest in a new right-back position to provide cover for Dani Carvajal next year, hence the interest in James.

item.title: What Was YouTube Star Angry Rantman's Cause of Death?
item.description: Abhradeep Saha, Known as Angry Rantman on YouTube, Has Died at Just 27 Years OldAngry Rantman suffered from multiple organ failure after going to the hospital for major surgery. By Joseph AllenApr. 18 2024, Published 9:50 a.m. ET Source: Instagram/@angryrantmanThanks to his own passionate opinions on sports like soccer and cricket, YouTube star Angry Rantman earned a loyal audience who would turn to him following major sporting events. The influencer, whose real name was Abhradeep Saha, became well known roughly five years ago, and now, many are in mourning following the news that he had died at just 27 years old.

item.title: Xianfeng Emperor - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Eighth emperor of the Qing dynasty and seventh emperor of the Qing dynasty who ruled over China proper from 1850 to 1861. His born name was Yizhu, and he took the throne when he was only 19 years old. He was the last Chinese emperor to have rule with authoritarian control, and he faced internal turbulence under his reign, including the Taiping Rebellion, the Nian Rebellion, and Second Opium War. item.title: Court Delivers Judgement On Suit Seeking To Disqualify Adeleke As PDP's Governorship Candidate
item.description: Justice Obiora Egwuatu of the Federal High Court, Abuja, has struck out a suit seeking the disqualification of Ademola Jackson Nurudeen Adeleke as the governorship candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) in the last July 26 election. Naija News reports that the suit was struck out on Thursday on the basis that the plaintiff lacked the locus standi to institute the case. The plaintiff, Awoyemi Oluwatayo Lukman, had filed charges against the Independent National Electoral Commission, INEC, the PDP and Adeleke.

She first gained national exposure as a contestant on Vietnam Idol in 2007. Trivia She was named Favorite Female Vocalist at the Zing Music Awards five times in a row from 2011 to 2015.

item.title: Northern Group Purchases PDP Presidential Form For Wike
item.description: a group, the Northern Progressives Elements and Friends of Wike, have purchased the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) Expression of Interest and Nomination Forms for Governor Nyesom Wike of Rivers State. The group led by Senator Sulieman Nazif said they decided to purchase the forms for the governor because of their belief in the Wike’s love for the country. Naija News reports that this was made known in a statement issued by the Rivers governor media aide, Kelvin Ebiri, on Tuesday.

item.title: How Gunmen Killed 2 Police Officers, Burnt Patrol Vehicle In Akwa Ibom
item.description: The Akwa Ibom Police Command has confirmed the killing of two police officers by unknown gunmen in the state. The gunmen who attacked the Ika divisional headquarters in the state also burnt down a police patrol vehicle. The incident was confirmed on Wednesday by the Akwa Ibom police spokesperson, Odiko Macdon. The spokesperson added that the gunmen who arrived on motorcycles on Tuesday, attempted to burn down the station but were repelled by officers on the ground.

item.title: Nigerian Navy Arrests Suspected 15 Oil Thieves
item.description: No fewer than 15 suspected oil thieves and six vesssels were handed over to the Nigerian Security and Civil Defence Corps (NSCDC), for prosecution in Port Harcourt on Sunday, November 8, by the Nigerian Navy . The executive officer of Nigerian Navy Ship (NNS), Olusegun Soyemi during the handover of the thieves disclosed that the suspects were arrested for their alleged involvements in unlawful bunkering. READ ALSO: Nigerian Navy Intercepts Ship With Stolen Oil

item.title: NUPENG Suspends Monday's Nationwide Strike
item.description: The National Union of Petroleum and Gas Workers (NUPENG) has announced the suspension of the planned strike by its affiliate members, Petroleum Tanker Drivers (PTD). Naija News reports that the PTD had planned to embark on a nationwide strike action on Monday over the state of bad highways across the country and other issues. The South-West Zonal Chairman of NUPENG, Tayo Aboyeji, disclosed that the strike was suspended because of the Federal Government’s intervention.

By Elissa NoblittPublished June 27 2024, 2:58 p.m. ET Source: Getty imagesWestern country musician and satirist Richard Samet “Kinky” Friedman has died at the age of 79. Kinky developed a major following due to his quirky antics and unique approach to country music (and life itself) — he even ran for governor of Texas in 2006 as an independent candidate.

item.title: About Lee and Jackie Peterson
item.description: Scott Peterson's Parents: What to Know About Lee and Jackie PetersonScott's parents always maintained that their son was innocent. By Jamie LeePublished Aug. 14 2024, 1:41 p.m. ET Source: ABC News/YouTubeOn Christmas Eve 2002, a 27-year-old expectant mom named Laci Peterson went missing from her home in Modesto, Calif. What happened next gripped the nation for years, and is still discussed to this day. Following an investigation and a widely publicized murder trial — which dominated the cable news cycle — Laci's husband Scott Peterson was convicted in the brutal murder of Laci and their unborn son, Conner.

item.title: Amidst Soaring Food Prices New Report Projects Nigerias Food Production To Hit 62 Billion In 2
item.description: A new forecast has projected a 48 percent  increase in food production in Nigeria between 2021 and 2024. Making the projection in a statement released on Thursday, Fairtrade and  the Organisation for Technology Advancement of Cold Chain in West Africa, OTACCWA, detailed that the 48 percent rise will reflect a €62.6bn  increase in food production in the country between 2021 and 2024. In the statement, the groups detailed that that the country’s food output has increased by 39.

item.title: Nigerian Journalist, David Hundeyin Reacts As Tinubu's Daughter Names Herself 'Iyaloja-General Of Ni
item.description: Nigerian journalist, David Hundeyin has reacted following the profile upgrade of the daughter of the President-elect Bola Tinubu, Folashade Tinubu-Ojo on the micro-blogging platform, Twitter. Naija News reports that Folashade named herself the ‘Iyaloja-general of Nigeria’  and the ‘First daughter of the Federal Republic of Nigeria (FRN).’ Mrs Tinubu-Ojo, daughter of President Bola Tinubu, inherited the market leader title from her deceased grandmother, Abibatu Mogaji. Following her father’s inauguration as the 16th President of Nigeria on Monday, 29th May,2023, Tinubu-Ojo edited her Twitter bio to read: “This is the Official Handle of The Iyaloja General of Nigeria || The First Daughter of the FRN.

item.title: Tonto Dikeh Advises Nigerians On Using 'God When' On Social Media
item.description: Popular Nollywood actress, Tonto Dikeh has decided to send an advice to her fans. The advice is coming after leaked audio and chat of her conversation with her ex-boyfriend, Prince Kpokpogri hit social media. The post was made via her Instagram page and she pleaded with people to be careful of what they do “God when” to because they do not have all the information and only see what they are allowed to see.

item.title: 'A Tourist's Guide to Love' Is a Love Letter to Vietnam Inside the Beautiful Filming Locations (
item.description: 'A Tourist's Guide to Love' director Steven K. Tsuchida spoke with 'Distractify' about filming the Netflix rom-com on location in Vietnam. item.title: Anxiety As Supreme Court Delivers Judgement On Gov Election Appeals Of Seven States Tomorrow
item.description: The Supreme Court is set to deliver judgment in the appeals involving the 2023 governorship election in seven states tomorrow, Friday, 12th January. Naija News understands the apex court will rule on the outcome of the governorship elections in Lagos, Kano, Zamfara, Plateau, Ebonyi, Cross River, and Bauchi states. The court will begin sitting from 9am. The Governors of the respective states and the candidates of other political parties who filed appeals against their victories would all be hoping they have convinced the Justices to rule in their favour.

item.title: Another Nigerian Begins 72-Hour Massage To Break Guinness World Record
item.description: Nigerian woman Joyc Ijeoma has begun a 72-hour effort to break the Guinness World Record for the longest massage on different individuals. Ijeoma is carrying out the exercise in Lekki, Lagos State. According to her, she is attempting an official attempt to set a Guinness World Record. However, there is yet to be an official confirmation from GWR. She revealed that she has done over 18 hours of massage in preparation for her record-breaking streak.

item.title: Facebook Domain Name Reportedly Stolen
item.description: The domain of technology giant and social media network, Facebook, has reportedly been stolen. It was gathered that Facebook and other platforms under it went down following an attempt to hijack the company’s domain name. According to reports, a yet to be identified hacker nuked the DNS A; an address file that holds an IP address of the domain name and AAA records for Facebook, Instagram and Whatsapp. Naija News had earlier reported that many users across the world are currently finding it difficult to gain access to WhatsApp, Instagram and Facebook.

item.title: 'No Need To Worry' - FG Speaks On Borrowing Sensibly And Responsibly
item.description: The Federal Government on Monday asked Nigerians not to worry about the nation’s increasing debt profile. The Minister of Finance, Budget and National Planning, Zainab Ahmed, made this known during a press conference in Abuja while reacting to the recent report by the National Bureau of Statistics (NBS) on the growth of the economy According to the minister, the government’s continued borrowing will not affect the economy negatively as projected by some Nigerians.

item.title: He Was Not In Osun
item.description: The Osun state police command has on Sunday, reacted to claims that the convoy of the All Progressives Congress, (APC) Presidential candidate, Asiwaju Bola Tinubu was attacked in the state at the weekend. item.title: Heather Dubrow and Gina Kirschenheiter Feud Explained (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: 'RHOC': Gina Kirschenheiter Says Heather Dubrow Feud Was "A Bit of a Stretch" (EXCLUSIVE)By Elizabeth RandolphAug. 30 2023, Updated 2:19 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesBravo’s groundbreaking Housewives show The Real Housewives of Orange County returned for its 17th season on June 7, 2023, and it's filled with drama among the longtime friend group. Tamra Judge returned after a two-season hiatus, with Vicki Gunvalson popping in for a few episodes. Amid the return of the Tres Amigas, there are feuds between other Housewives, including Heather Dubrow and Gina Kirschenheiter.

item.title: How Much Did Tom Brady Make From the Roast?
item.description: Tom Brady Regrets His Time Being Roasted on Netflix — Does He Regret the Paycheck?Tom Brady claimed to be "unroastable" in preparation for his Netflix comedy roast, but he ultimately regrets being on it. By Callie (Carlos) CadornigaMay 16 2024, Published 1:06 p.m. ET Source: NetflixWhen the greatest quarterback in the history of American football retires from the NFL, what's there left to do? Apparently, Tom Brady's answer is to get roasted on Netflix.

item.title: Mads Lewis - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Content creator and actress who has earned over 12 million fans on TikTok posting lips syncs and viral dance videos. Her TikTok handle is mads.yo. She portrays Birdie Kaye on the popular web series Chicken Girls. She has been a member of the Just A House content collective. She has a merchandise line through Fanjoy that includes many items with her branded JRYB slogan, which stands for "Just Remember You're Beautiful."  Before Fame She found a following on TikTok when the app was known as musical.

item.title: Man United Captain, Maguire Speaks On Rift With Ronaldo
item.description: Manchester United captain Harry Maguire has denied reports of a power struggle with Portuguese international, Cristiano Ronaldo. Several reports had emerged suggesting that both players have been at loggerheads as the club battle to end the season in the Premier League’s top four. Maguire has been well below his best this season and it has been reported the United skipper feels undermined by Ronaldo’s influence, with his continued role as captain questioned.

item.title: Marilyn Monroe - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Icon and sex symbol who starred in the classic comedy Some Like It Hot and became the most famous woman in the world during the 1950s. Her other memorable films include 1955's The Seven Year Itch and 1953's Gentlemen Prefer Blondes. Personal struggles took hold of her late in her career and she died of an overdose of barbiturates at the young age of 36. Before Fame She modeled for Blue Book before changing her name from Norma Jeane Mortenson to Marilyn Monroe.

item.title: Meet You, Me & My Ex Season 2 Star DeAndre Asbury-Heath
item.description: De’Andre has been collecting reality dating series left and right. Did you know the TLC star is a former 'Love Island USA' contestant? There is certainly no shortage of messy reality romance series. However, TLC tends to dominate when producing drama-fueled dating shows. From Seeking Brother Husband to 90 Day Fiancé, the network consistently cranks out unconventional concepts that keep viewers wanting more. Article continues below advertisement And You, Me & My Ex is no different.

item.title: Nicole Mitchell Murphy - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Star and executive producer of the reality series Hollywood Exes, she is a former model who worked overseas with top brands including Valentino, Yves St. Laurent, Chanel, Ungaro, and more. Before Fame She worked in commercials and print before trying out fashion modeling. She was only 14 when she earned the top prize at an international model search contest, leading to her signing with the prestigious Ford Modeling Agency. Trivia She opened her own jewelry line called FLP by Nicole Murphy in 2009.

item.title: nottrebeca - Age, Family, Bio
Opinion: Kenyas clergy must reclaim pulpit power, walk in the footsteps of Gitari, Ndingi
item.description: The silence and passiveness of the church regarding the disturbing moral defect in Kenya today are unmistakable. Since the olden days, the church is expected to be the patron of morality in society. It has played this role perfectly; until recently. Today, the leadership of the church in Kenya seems to have forgotten this basic yet essential role. The clergy is a faded shadow of the pioneer leadership that made the church a greatly respected entity.

item.title: Ryan Tannehill Was Demoted to Backup Quarterback Permanently After His Injury
item.description: Ryan Tannehill's promise is indisputable, but the coaches still managed to replace him after he suffered an injury. Now, he won't be starting again. Source: Getty ImagesThe Gist: Ryan Tannehill suffered an ankle injury in week six of the 2023 NFL season.Tennessee Titans coaches appointed Will Levis to step up.The team made the change permanent.Starting his professional NFL career in 2012 with the Miami Dolphins, Ryan Tannehill now plays for the Tennessee Titans.

item.title: Sam Wilson Finally Dons a Captain America Suit in 'The Falcon and Winter Soldier'
item.description: In the finale of 'The Falcon and the Winter Soldier,' Sam Wilson suits up as Captain America. His new suit is similar to the one he wears in the comics. Source: Disney Plus/Marvel StudiosSpoiler alert: This article contains spoilers for the series finale of The Falcon and the Winter Soldier. Marvel’s The Falcon and the Winter Soldier has wrapped up its story with the release of its sixth and final installment.

item.title: Shekau Kills Own Commander, Appoints New One
item.description: The factional leader of the Boko Haram terrorist group, Abubakar Shekau has appointed Abu Muhammad as the new commander of the group. This follows the killing of the former Commander, Abu Fatim by the leader for alleged betrayal. Naija News gathered that Shekau shot and killed Fatim himself and two other commanders over an internal dispute relating to their loyalty to the sect. A source quoted by PR Nigeria disclosed on Thursday, April 29, 2021, that two other senior Commanders were also eliminated by the ‘daredevil’ Shekau.

item.title: So, Is Heat Level in 'Fortnite' a Good or Bad Thing? Here's What to Know
item.description: The ongoing Most Wanted event in 'Fortnite' debuted new cosmetics and a heat level mechanic during matches. But what exactly is heat level? Here's what to know. Source: Epic GamesKicking off on Feb. 14, Epic Games rolled out the Most Wanted event in Fortnite that debuted plenty of new unlockable cosmetics, challenges to overcome, and mechanics to spice up matches. Seeing all the brand-new additions arriving to the game is a familiar cyclical sight for the live-service battle royale game since it moved past the days of OG Fortnite.

item.title: Tenant Uses Negative Review to Get Out of Lease in Viral TikTok
item.description: A tenant shared their "lease break hack" on TikTok after the owner of their apartment building allowed them to break their lease without fees. To say that the United States has a housing problem would be a massive understatement. The median cost of homes increased by a whopping 16% from 2021 and 2022. item.title: The Season 3 Finale of 'Virgin River' Dealt a Heavy Blow to Preacher Will He Be OK?
item.description: What happened to Preacher on 'Virgin River'? The popular character found himself in a fraught predicament in the Season 3 finale. What's next? Source: NetflixSpoiler alert: This article contains spoilers for the Season 3 of Virgin River. The Season 3 finale of Virgin River had no shortage of surprise twists and turns. Some of the characters found themselves in grave trouble. For others, the whole world turned upside down. And of course, there were a precious few who got through just fine, bar a few minor impediments.

item.title: Unfortunately Designed Religious Bumper Sticker
item.description: Unfortunately Designed Religious Bumper Sticker Has The Internet Rolling With LaughterBy Mustafa GatollariUpdated Nov. 18 2019, 2:33 p.m. ET Source: twitterBumper stickers by themselves are almost always questionable automotive accessories. I mean, it's great that you have a message you want to send the rest of the highway. But it doesn't take long for the stickers to become unsightly and dirty. They can also hurt the aesthetics of your car and come off as a little lame.
